alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:58AM PST until December 15 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge
